MemoryInfobox.location: Temple of Apollo Epikourios|Temple of Apollo, Arkadia

General_Description: '''Strange Disease''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''It sounds too good to be true... a spring that heals all? Travel east along the border of [[Psophis Foothills]] to find a [[Cave of Ionides|cave]] that once housed the [[Ionides]] sisterhood of [[nymph]]s. I will be waiting near its entrance on a submerged basin of offerings.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
